article.title: Lebolo-Watts to Construct Satellite Communications Center
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Defense Satellite Communications System Operations Center

article.text: Lebolo-Watts Constructors, J.V., L.L.C., Boynton Beach, Florida, was awarded an approximate $18 million firm-fixed-price contract for the Wideband Satellite Communications Operations Center to replace the existing Defense Satellite Communications System Operations Center. The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, Baltimore, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
